content: बाहुः [बाध् कु धस्य हः <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} The arm; शांतमिदमाश्रमपदं स्फुरति च बाहुः कुतः फलमिहास्य <ls>Ś. 1. 16</ls>; so महाबाहुः &c. {@--2@} The fore-arm. {@--3@} The forefoot of an animal. {@--4@} A door-post. {@--5@} The base of a right-angled triangle (in geom.). {@--6@} (In medic.) The whole upper extremity of the body (<ab>opp.</ab> सक्थि). {@--7@} The bar of a chariot-pole. {@--8@} The shadow of the gnomon on a sun-dial. --हू (<ab>du.</ab>) The lunar mansion Ārdrā.
